name: SPRX
headline: AI for corporate R&D tax credits
description:
SPRX uses AI to prepare corporate R&D tax credits.

With our technology, anyone can prepare an R&D Tax Credit accurately and fast. To provide some background, the R&D Credit is often cited as the most complex and audited tax credit in the United States. With that in mind, we set out to create software to achieve two primary objectives:

1. Ensure that any credit computed with our software is exactly what the IRS is asking for in terms of quality.

2. Democratize the ability to perform high quality R&D Credit studies extremely fast.

# Maximize Incentives, Minimize Hassle
While traditional firms take months, our tax and industry experts use innovative AI-powered software to complete your study in 2-3 weeks. More incentive, less time, zero stress.
[Talk with an expert](https://sprx.tax/<https:/calendly.com/lon-oconnor-sprx>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/675c73b47eefd6d441f2b887/677c036500fac8c258187da7_main-hero-platform-updated.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/675c73b47eefd6d441f2b887/675c73b47eefd6d441f2b972_boxes1.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/675c73b47eefd6d441f2b887/675c73b47eefd6d441f2b971_boxes2.webp)
## The modern standard for claiming R&D Credit179D DeductionCost Segregation
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/675c73b47eefd6d441f2b887/675c73b47eefd6d441f2b986_icon-people.svg)
500+
Clients
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/675c73b47eefd6d441f2b887/675c73b47eefd6d441f2b987_icon-money.svg)
300M+
Incentives delivered
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/675c73b47eefd6d441f2b887/675c73b47eefd6d441f2b988_icon-star.svg)
2-3 weeks
Avg. turnaround time
## Our AI-powered software saves you time and money
### 1. Gather and upload your files to our software
We integrate with popular enterprise softwares such as ADP, Gusto, Paylocity, Quickbooks, Netsuite, Jira, Azure, and much more.For added flexibility, our uploading portal allows you to effortlessly import data via spreadsheets, PDFs, and various other file formats. Simply upload your files or integrate with your data provider, and our system takes care of the rest.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/675c73b47eefd6d441f2b887/676994ba5fdc10ef3c002219_feature-one-main.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/675c73b47eefd6d441f2b887/676994bab40595983c72cc22_feature-one-secondary.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/675c73b47eefd6d441f2b887/6769966fc0491ed84a3f18ac_feature-two-main.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/675c73b47eefd6d441f2b887/6769966ecd0e3fbcf9a41238_feature-two-secondary.png)
### 2. Our AI-powered software processes your documents
Our industry-leading software processes your documents and generates predictions in minutes compared to what traditionally takes weeks or months to do.
### 3. Review and verify
Our industry and tax experts work closely with you to validate the predictions and analytics generated by our AI, ensuring accuracy and reliability. With a human-in-the-loop approach, we combine the power of AI with expert industry and tax oversight to deliver insights and results you can trust.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/675c73b47eefd6d441f2b887/6769a018caf962db4cc48db4_feature-three-main.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/675c73b47eefd6d441f2b887/6769a01785219e07a9570e19_feature-three-secondary.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/675c73b47eefd6d441f2b887/6769a47fed4776fb1aee3590_feature-four-main.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/675c73b47eefd6d441f2b887/6769a47ffe5404022461253b_feature-four-secondary.png)
### 4. Receive an audit-ready report
Your tax credit package is ready, fully equipped with detailed calculations and all supporting evidence. We provide all the comprehensive reports you will need to seamlessly file your taxes. We go a step further by including audit support, ensuring compliance and peace of mind throughout the process.
## Not sure where to start? We can help
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/675c73b47eefd6d441f2b93e/676586f045f5e2fc93bf1803_65f4c48314cdaa244ded6a56_65c2b5b2f71f67763929a3d4_AI-Graph.png)AI Has Crossed the LineAI has crossed the line and business leaders cannot get enough. For years people have wondered when artificial intelligence (“AI”) would advance to the stage that computers become smarter than humans. We watched in amazement as AI technology passed key milestones: Read More](https://sprx.tax/</blogs/ai-has-crossed-the-line>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/675c73b47eefd6d441f2b93e/676586f02bd87acce80b4bb1_65f4c4832185a3329423dc79_65c2aa2b89979755176d0d99_pexels-john-guccione-wwwadvergroupcom-3483098.jpeg)Don’t Let Them Miss QREs!Your Research & Development tax credit is dependent on identifying ALL your Qualified Research Expenses (QREs). If your R&D credit provider does not know ALL the rules (and very few do), they will miss QREs.Read More](https://sprx.tax/</blogs/dont-let-them-miss-qres>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/675c73b47eefd6d441f2b93e/676586f03f362ab5bd9faaee_65f4c4830401bc4c08216df0_65c2a7a42ab623c5a1703edb_Reddit-Post-SALY-e1687293346188.png)Don't follow SALY, she's no leader!Accountants love to follow SALY (same as last year). We could write a textbook on all the psychology that leads us to follow SALY accounting. I can imagine chapters such as absolution from responsibility, covering your self doubt, and a plausible excuse for errors.Read More](https://sprx.tax/</blogs/dont-follow-saly-shes-no-leader>)
[Read More](https://sprx.tax/</blog>)
## What Our Clients Are Saying
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/675c73b47eefd6d441f2b887/677c00e8581bdbadcd4dcd4b_Raj.svg)
Raj 
“This has been incredible! I’m going to introduce you to everyone I’ve ever met.”

generated_description:
### Overview of SPRX

**Company Name:** SPRX  
**Founded:** 2020  
**Location:** Wilmington, DE  
**Team Size:** 22 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch:** W23  
**Website:** [sprx.tax](https://sprx.tax)

---

### Mission

SPRX is dedicated to simplifying and democratizing corporate R&D tax credits through innovative AI technology. This complex and frequently audited tax credit can be a daunting task for businesses, but SPRX aims to make the process as seamless as possible. 

### What They Do

SPRX has developed an AI-driven platform that enables companies to prepare for R&D tax credits quickly and accurately. Here are their main offerings:

1. **R&D Tax Credits:** Their software assists clients in understanding and claiming R&D tax credits, processing the required documentation much faster than traditional firms.
   
2. **179D Deduction:** SPRX simplifies the energy efficiency tax deduction process for companies, providing further avenues for tax savings.

### Key Features of the Service

- **Speedy Processing:** While conventional firms take months to deliver their services, SPRX completes tax credit studies in an average of 2-3 weeks. This is a game changer in an industry known for its sluggishness.
  
- **AI-Powered Accuracy:** Clients simply gather and upload necessary documents, and SPRX’s software processes these inputs in minutes. It combines AI predictions with oversight from industry experts to ensure the highest quality results.

- **Audit-Ready Reports:** Once the study is complete, clients receive a comprehensive package that includes detailed calculations and documentation, ensuring they are fully prepared for any audits.

### Client Impact

Since its inception, SPRX has successfully assisted over 500 clients, delivering more than $300 million in incentives. The feedback from clients highlights the effectiveness and efficiency of SPRX's services, with many expressing astonishment at the potential savings they were unaware they could access.

### Leadership

Michael Seibel serves as Group Partner, bringing his insights from Y Combinator to guide the team in scaling their operation and improving their services.

### Why It Matters

The ability to claim R&D tax credits is crucial for companies looking to reinvest in innovation. SPRX is not just facilitating a tax process; they're enabling corporations to maximize financial incentives that can drive growth and productivity. By bridging the complexity of tax regulations with user-friendly technology, SPRX stands at the forefront of modern tax management.

---

If you’re interested in claiming your R&D tax credit, or simply want to learn more, SPRX invites you to talk to their experts and discover how their platform can support your business.
